item.title: 【Unreleased/Unofficial (lossy)】iTunes Plus - Little Mix - DNA (Remastered 2024)
item.description:
Parkwood Presents:
Little Mix, the British girl group formed in 2011, is known for their powerful vocals, catchy pop hits, and inspiring messages of empowerment and unity. Their debut album, "DNA," originally released in 2012, marked a significant milestone in their career, showcasing their talent and establishing them as a force in the music industry.

In 2021, Jesy Nelson, one of the original members, made the difficult decision to leave Little Mix to focus on her mental health and well-being. Her departure was met with understanding and support from both her bandmates and fans, who respected her need to prioritize her happiness.
In a move to honor Jesy's wishes and respect her decision to not be associated with the group, Parkwood Entertainment have reworked and remastered "DNA". This release is not intended to erase Jesy's contributions but to acknowledge her desire to move forward from her time with the group.
The album has been meticulously remastered, from the Standard Version & Target Exclusive pressing, ensuring that the sound quality is top-notch and mastered for iTunes, offering a fresh listening experience while maintaining the essence of the original recordings.
This reworked version of "DNA" serves as a tribute to the group's journey and evolution. It is a celebration of Little Mix's enduring spirit and their commitment to delivering exceptional music to their fans. The updated album provides a unique opportunity to experience the early days of Little Mix in a new light, while also paving the way for their continued success as a trio.
All graphic designs, including covers and physical mockups, as well as audio editing, mastering, and ripping, were created and executed by me. This project is the result of my own work and effort. All rights reserved.
---


Release Date: 24th July 2024
